title: Re: Brokeback Mountain
content:
I don't think so. The idea doesn't sound that interesting to me. I've heard positive reviews about it, though. Not that I'd give a garg what critics say, but it's always nice to hear them say something positive about a movie. Or well, who knows. Perhaps I see it. I'm confused! title: Re: Brokeback Mountain
content: This movie was amazing.  One of the best movies I've seen in quite awhile.  Amazing acting, direction, and scripting.  If you aren't a shallow homophobe, then I suggest you see it.[img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]
